comments.comment:
It's a topic which is destroying and destroyed many nations. 
..
Firstly, we need to understand all religions are against sexual pleasures outside marriage. 
..
Except for a few gene copy errors, a normal human has 3 stages in their sexual maturity. 
..
If not for social pressure for them to reach full maturity, lot of children will not reach maturity. 
..
Hence, science have confirmed the religious views. 
..
The issue is with the scientists and not the science. 
..
If you look at places like Scandinavia, you will find the suicide rate has gone up due to untimely sexual pleasures. 
..
All the monks were trying to do is to support, our future generations wellbeing. They can see the poison coming with it by looking at the world today. 
..
Yes we need to be kind to each other but should not promote failure. 
..
I'm sure teaching the children about social behavior, how predators approach and with good security measures will keep away the few bad apples. 
..
Definitely sexual education is required but without promoting sexual pleasures.
comments.author: suranga gunasekera

comments.comment:
SEX EDUCATION SHOULD NOT BE ABOUT SEX OR SEXUAL ACTIVITY. ALSO SEX EDUCATION SHOULD NOT BE A SELF-LEARNING  PROGRAM BY READING BOOKS,FOR CHILDREN. IT CAN BE HARMFUL, BECAUSE THIS TOPIC COVERS  VAST AREAS OF MENTAL & PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENTS IN HUMAN. MOSTLY THESE PROGRAMS INCLUDE HUMAN REPRODUCTIVE SYSTEM UNDER THE TOPICS OF HUMAN BIOLOGY.THIS TOPIC SHOULD BE TAUGHT, USING APPROPRIATE RESOURCES IN THE COMPULSORY SCIENCE CURRICULUM IN SCHOOLS FOR THE AGE APPROPRIATE GROUPS, CONSIDERING THE CHILD MATURITY, CULTURAL & RELIGIOUS BELIEFS, RACE, ETHNICITY  ETC. THIS AGE APPROPRIATENESS & THE CONTENT DIFFERS FROM COUNTRY TO COUNTRY. ALSO THE PARENTAL CONSENTS & OTHER VARIOUS FACTORS. IN SOME COUNTRIES SEX EDUCATION IS EXCLUDED FROM THE CURRICULUM & NO INCREASE OF SEX CRIMES INCREASE TO BE SEEN TOO. 
DEFINITELY PARENTS & CAREGIVERS ARE LEGALLY RESPONSIBLE TO PROTECT THE CHILDREN INCLUDING INFANTS FROM  SEXUAL PREDATORS. IRRESPONSIBLE PARENTS SHOULD BE PUNISHED.THIS AWARENESS  CAN BE GIVEN TO  PARENTS THROUGH VARIOUS WAYS.
comments.author: Ma Kusa

comments.comment: What Ven Medagoda and the other Venerable say should not be bluffed. See how all ladies try to make this book a chronicle believing that after introducing this book to grade 7 students, the sexual abuse rate in Sri Lanka will come down to zero. See the extent of their assumption ( I do not defame women). There is no solid base for the introduction of such a booklet for school going students whose competence level has still not reached to understand some concepts related to sex. Why don't they do a study about the effectiveness of such material rather than trying to make their opinions understand by others. Did grade 7 students in Sri Lanka demand such a book or did their parents did? Whose requirement is this group is trying to fulfill by claiming that they did a national task or the need of the era? I don't know their real objectives.One thing is clear that this specific group wants to destroy our children.

replies.replyComment:
@sdherath 
Thank you very much and I think it's possible, the basic thing is we need to get closer to our kids,
@Beauty Beast I wish all the fathers are like you!

@sdherath 
I think you are correct doctor,  I'm also a father of a 12 year son, I have seen to my own eyes that my 12 year son was masterbating, very first day when I saw him doing that, I felt happy, because I felt that my son is a big now, I hope you can understand what I'm trying to say, since you also have boys, as a father we always have to be proud about our boys, but in other side I was thinking when I was 12 years old, what i was doing, but now the society is different, not like our good old days, so I thought of talking to my son about this, I explained to him, little by little, I saw he was listening to me very carefully, I told him masterbating is not a bad thing, but don't try to get addicted to that, Now you should focus your mind on to your studies, Now every week I used to go with him to the beach and we both used to have a sea bath and play with sand, and very carefully I talk with him about what he feels, I think he is now fine, and he used to ask me some certain things, so very carefully I answer to them, but I don't skip any questions of his, otherwise I think they will start to experience the answers in the wrong direction, one more thing when I started to talk talk with my son, he was very open, he was telling me appachchi my underwears are bit tight now, I need some new underwears, so I asked him, why didn't you tell me or amma about it, he says I was shy to tell appachchi, see these are small things they suffer, so I took him to a shop and asked him to buy the underwears he want, I didn't suggest him to buy what I want, I gave him the chance to buy  what he wants, after buying when I was driving to home, I explained him about underwears, I told him you must wear very clean underwears, never use the same underwear for 2 days, once you come after school wash your self and Change all your clothes, and wear a new underwear to home, so   I think he is learning little by little, and I keep eye contact about him.

@Tharaka samith dear tharaka, I am sorry that I could not take time to use Helakuru. but I will try to explain simply. the evidence suggest that young people learn a lot about their bodies and changes that occur much early. This also involves masturbation( ‡∑É‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∂∫) and copulaiton. the misconception is sex education is about copulation( ‡∑É‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑É‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂ú‡∂∫). no, they are two different things. further, it is ok and quite normal to describe normal biological processes as we do for example digestive tract and cardiovascular system. What we are doing now is reproductive education( more correct word) so secretive, and taboo subject. if we can eat, breath, think ,move and learn about those normal biological activities since we are young there is no reason to worry about. if kids ask that question, we should not be shy to explain that clearly, simply and consciously without shame. human body or its functions are normal and no need to be shameful about that. we have value system perpetuated by Victorian ideology abandoned by English but venerated by Sri Lankans. we should leave that mentality and move forward. this is nothing to do with politics but health of the nation.

@Tharaka samith here some help putha, I have two grown up sons and a daughter and I am a consultant psychiatrist by profession specialising in addiction.  this book is just a introductory book, neither detailed or guide. one need to read great deal to understand gender and human sexuality. as an adult you can and should read far and wide.thats fine for anyone who could understand,

@sdherath i'm a father. I have a daughter 11 years old. She has no eny idea about gender educatio. But enytime open my eyes. Thanks for your oppinions. so This Book is very interesting over gread nine childrens. Very Very good guidebook.

so, you suggest to decide education decisions on public opinion? putha, as far as we know, public opinion is not considered in making sound, policy decisions. I believe anoma jinadaree is spot on social and biological matters are concerned. what you express is your values and opinion. unfortunately, they do not and should not govern education. here are some evidence for your reading pleasure. Sri Lanka is one of the top countries in the world on, child abuse, abortions( illegal), domestic violence, accessing pornography on google, suicide and exporting mothers to Middle East. I hope you could open your eyes and get out of that little cage of yours

‚Äã@eyes widely open fighter I asked for a single reason why homosexuality is wrong. and back your claim up with stats/data. So, is it wrong just because you say so?


Pl note that only about 3% of humans have homosexual tendencies and they are born that way. Granting their rights will not render the other 97% infertile and they will do their procreation without any hindrance. Also, a person's sexual orientation is not a choice or a learned behavior. And they cannot change it. Forcing them to marry a member of opposite sex is similar to forcing you to marry a man (assuming you're a male). How is it any fair?
Try (or try to imagine) french kissing a guy and you'll see that being a homosexual is not a choice! 
Abnormal? abnormal denotes not naturally occuring. Are you under the impression that only humans exhibit homosexual behavior?  If so, please learn more..
Apart from that, since when do we learn behaviors from nature? And do you think there is anything natural about going to work in a car or typing in front of a PC?


Am I lesbian? No; and it doesn't matter anyways. Learn what 'Ad hominem' is. If Hitler said something true, it remains true regardless of who said it.
Creating the next generation is a major objective of sex. But it is not the only function of it. Expressing your love & affection, creating trust, sharing your life, communication and general well being comes with it. Why do you want to prevent another human being from cherishing the same things you have? What power do you have to force another person to live in fear, humiliation and agony? How does two consenting adults do in their private home affect you?

Apart from being a cultural anomaly, can you come up with a single reason as to why the same sex marriage is wrong? Why do you think so many countries allow same sex marriages now? How is it correct to oppress the rights of 1/30th of humanity just because you don't understand the science? Contrary to "eyes wide open", statistics show that you are wrong

replies.replyComment: Gono me pothe wadagathkama therenne nathi hindai ubla ohoma kiyawanne... Mn oya potha baluwa. Meken sanskruthiyta wena haniyk naha. Ubatath onnam blnna kiypn mn link eka dannam. Lankawe lamainwa apachara walin beranna me potha loku udawwak wewi... A witharak newei meka lankawe  oya rape case wala windithaynta sadaranaya etu krnna loku udawwak wewi. Mn ehma kiynne Lankawe oya rape case walata daduwam denna giyma usawi wala mara prashnayak athi wenwa. Mkda oya nadu ahddi windithaya (a kiynne dushanata lakwuna kena) a gna usawiyta kiynna harima lajjai. Ai??? Ape rate thiyna me kehelmal "Victorian sanskruthiya" nisa  Owa gna elipita katha krnna puduma lajjai saha eka kiynneth unta therenneth na. "Eya mehen alluwa.... Arakata meka dmma..." Mewa aheddi judge holman. Paminille neethiwediya puduma mahansiyk gnna ona hari uththarayk gnna. Ethin ohoma walpal uththara denna gihin anthimata aparadakaraya nidahas wenwa. Elagata? U ethanin nawathinne na mkda oya rapistla kiynna eka widiyka manasa wikruthi wuna ewun tikak. Ethin un ayeth ekama krnwa. Oka nawaththa gnna nm ara wage walpal natuwa hariyta aka kiynna me wage sex education ona wenne. Onna oya therenne nathi kama nathi krnna me wage pothk ona wenne. Dnwath therunada.
